channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 15:39 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack!
item.description: 🟠 15:39 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
